column5: Just thought I would share some various pictures with everyone... I will let the pics speak for themselves  Camping @ Camp Hillbilly with the family..                  Weekend @ Bernies!             And her Maiden Voyage!    and Last but not least.....  <embed width="448" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://i129.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid129.photobucket.com/albums/p224/gerritt_2006/MOV01962.flv"></embed>
Great pics!  What a great looking boy!  dk

Looks like you are enjoying some amazing family time this summer.  Thanks for sharing... the new boat looks like it will give you a great deal of joy!  Cheers  Can't wait to see the fish you catch from it!  Jen
Great pics Gerritt. The boat sits nice in the water it will do you well. Your young lad sure is growing up fast.  Thanks for the pics.
Nice pics gerritt !!!!!! and oh ya nice new boat,she looks great   cheeers
